description:
" A picture is worth ten thousand words."
I am a very neat and healthy single gentleman. I am neat because I have style. I am healthy because I only eat healthy foods and with no bad habit. I am gentlemen because I have character. I have good manners because I respect others and take responsibility. I feel and look young and with lots of energy because I an optimist with a humor sense. I enjoy life, tennis, swimming, and ski are my favorite entertainments and sports. I believe "There is only one happiness in life—to love and be loved." The most important thing in life is to learn how to give out love, and to let it come in. Did I miss something?
